title: Number of Crunchyroll subscribers 2012 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in thousands in the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The difference of Number of users in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 1900.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in thousands for 6 number of Months.
The Number of users in thousands is highest at Month November 2018 and lowest at Month September 2012.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in thousands in the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The difference of Number of users in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 1900.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
Second maximum Number of users in thousands is found at Month February 2017.
There is a difference of 1900.0 between the maximum Month November 2018 and minimum Month September 2012.
Number of users in thousands at Month November 2018 is 2000.0 , second place is February 2017 at 1000.0, and thirdly is November 2015 at 750.0.
The Number of users in thousands has reduced over the past 6 Months.
The Month November 2018 tends to be 2.7 percent higher than average.
The Number of users in thousands is 4450.0 if we add up values of all Months.
